nodes.text: The Hettitite system was a star system located within the Outer Rim Territories' Dalonbian sector. It contained the planet Hettitite, which was the homeworld of a sentient Near-Human species.

At some point, Hettitite became threatened by a supernova, and in 365 BBY, members of the native species colonized the planet Sernpidal in the Julevian system, eventually becoming known as Sernpidalans.
The Hettitite system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and which placed it in grid square M-2.
